Description: Unique identifier for each customer record
Customer gender value as provided in source
Flag indicating if customer is a homeowner (source-coded)
Number of cars owned by customer
Total number of children for customer
Number of children currently living at home
Geography/location identifier for customer (joins to a geography dimension if available)
Unique identifier for each product record
Date and time when product becomes available for sale
Cost per unit for the product
Selling price per unit for the product
Unit of measure ID for weight (source-coded)
Unit of measure ID for selling unit (source-coded)
Unit of measure name for selling unit
Product subcategory identifier (joins to subcategory dimension if available)
